channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.1.4
item.description:
This is the May 2018 quarterly update for PostgreSQL.

  • PostgreSQL 10.4 with PostGIS 2.4.4
  • PostgreSQL 9.6.9 with PostGIS 2.3.7
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.13 with PostGIS 2.2.7

item.title: Postgres.app 2.1.3
item.description:
This update includes security updates for PostgreSQL.

  • PostgreSQL 10.3 with PostGIS 2.4.3
  • PostgreSQL 9.6.8 with PostGIS 2.3.6
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.12 with PostGIS 2.2.6

item.title: Postgres.app 2.1.2
item.description:
This update includes the quarterly maintenance updates for PostgreSQL!

  • PostgreSQL 10.2 with PostGIS 2.4.3
  • PostgreSQL 9.6.7 with PostGIS 2.3.6
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.11 with PostGIS 2.2.6

item.title: Postgres.app 2.1.1
item.description:
This update includes the quarterly maintenance updates for PostgreSQL!

  • PostgreSQL 10.1 with PostGIS 2.4.1
  • PostgreSQL 9.6.6 with PostGIS 2.3.4
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.10 with PostGIS 2.2.6

item.title: Postgres.app 2.1
item.description:
This update includes the all new PostgreSQL 10!

  • PostgreSQL 10.0 (Release Notes) with PostGIS 2.4.0
  • PostgreSQL 9.6.5 (Release Notes) with PostGIS 2.3.3
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.9 (Release Notes) with PostGIS 2.2.5

Since this update also contains PostgreSQL 9.5 and 9.6, you can continue using your servers. Once you are ready to upgrade, just create a new server with version 10, and use pg_dump to migrate your data.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.0.5
item.description:
This update includes the quarterly maintenance updates for PostgreSQL:

  • PostgreSQL 9.6.5 (Release Notes) with PostGIS 2.3.3
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.9 (Release Notes) with PostGIS 2.2.5

item.title: Postgres.app 2.0.4
item.description:
This update includes the quarterly maintenance updates for PostgreSQL:

  • PostgreSQL 9.6.4 (Release Notes) with PostGIS 2.3.3
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.8 (Release Notes) with PostGIS 2.2.5

item.title: Postgres.app 2.0.3
item.description:
This update includes the quarterly maintenance updates for PostgreSQL:

  • PostgreSQL 9.6.3 (Release Notes) with PostGIS 2.3.2
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.7 (Release Notes) with PostGIS 2.2.5

This release also contains two bugfixes:

  • Changed menu icon to use native light/dark mode #385
  • Fixed race condition at automatic server start #386

item.title: Postgres.app 2.0.2
item.description:
This update includes the quarterly maintenance updates for PostgreSQL:

  • PostgreSQL 9.6.2 (Release Notes) with PostGIS 2.3.2
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.6 (Release Notes) with PostGIS 2.2.5

In addition, Postgres.app 2.0.2 also contains some minor UI tweaks:

  • configuration files are no longer opened in TextEdit (to avoid typographic quotes) #368
  • the elephant menu now contains "show preferences" and "check for updates" commands #373

item.title: Postgres.app 2.0.1
item.description:
This is the official release of the all new Postgres.app!

Feature highlights include:

  • all new UI
  • automatic updates
  • run multiple servers simultaneously

The following versions of PostgreSQL are included inside the package:

  • PostgreSQL 9.6.1 (with PostGIS 2.3.1)
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.5 (with PostGIS 2.2.4)

Postgres.app 2.0 requires macOS 10.10 or later.

Version 2.0.1 fixes a crash on macOS 10.10.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.0
item.description:
This is the first official release of the all new Postgres.app!

Feature highlights include:

  • all new UI
  • automatic updates
  • run multiple servers simultaneously

The following versions of PostgreSQL are included inside the package:

  • PostgreSQL 9.6.1 (with PostGIS 2.3.1)
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.5 (with PostGIS 2.2.4)

Postgres.app 2.0 requires macOS 10.10 or later.

There have been no changes since Postgres.app 2.0 Beta 4 except for dropping the "beta" label.

item.title: Postgres 2.0 Beta 4
item.description:
This beta 4 update of Postgres.app includes the following features:

  • bugfix for Stop button #362 (thanks to @ultimate-deej)
  • better error handling when initialising new servers
  • new server settings popover

This build includes 2 versions of PostgreSQL:

  • PostgreSQL 9.6.1 (with PostGIS 2.3.1)
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.5 (with PostGIS 2.2.4)

item.title: Postgres 2.0 Beta 3
item.description:
This beta 3 update of Postgres.app includes the following features:

  • bugfix for dark mode (thanks to Adam Hartford)

This build includes 2 versions of PostgreSQL:

  • PostgreSQL 9.6.1 (with PostGIS 2.3)
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.5 (with PostGIS 2.2.3)

item.title: Postgres 2.0 Beta 2
item.description:
This is the beta 2 update of the all new Postgres.app!

This build includes 2 versions of PostgreSQL:

  • PostgreSQL 9.6.1 (with PostGIS 2.3)
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.5 (with PostGIS 2.2.3)

item.title: Postgres 2.0 Beta 1
item.description:
This is the first public beta of the all new Postgres.app!

This build includes 2 versions of PostgreSQL:

  • PostgreSQL 9.6 (with PostGIS 2.3)
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.4 (with PostGIS 2.2.2)

item.title: Postgres 2.0 Alpha 1
item.description: • Initial public version of the new Postgres.app
